SportsFacilities.Philosophy: Sports improve mental health, physical fitness, and personality skills like leadership, teamwork, communication, confidence, and discipline.

IndoorGames.Usage: Faculty, staff, and students; annual competitions held

IndoorGames.Name: Yoga
IndoorGames.Details: Open to all students; Yoga team performs at external events

IndoorGames.Name: Chess, Table Tennis, Caroms

OutdoorGames.Name: Football
OutdoorGames.Details: Coaching from 4-5:30 pm daily; 12-member team; three intra-college events annually; participates in inter-collegiate competitions

OutdoorGames.Name: Basketball
OutdoorGames.Facility: Professional-standard court next to football field
OutdoorGames.Details: Team participated in tournaments by BITS Hyderabad (24-27 Jan 2019) and Vidya Jyothi Institute (2-3 Apr 2019); hosted inter-college tournament at KMIT (17-18 Jan 2015) with 40 colleges

OutdoorGames.Name: Volleyball
OutdoorGames.Details: Coaching provided daily evening; intra-college events held periodically
